commits.message:
TEZ-3880: Do not count rejected tasks as killed in vertex progress (Sergey Shelukhin, reviewed by Gunther Hagleitner)

Signed-off-by: Gopal V <gopalv@apache.org>
TEZ-3869. Analyzer: Fix VertexInfo::getLastTaskToFinish comparison (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3861. PipelineSorter setting negative progess (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3805. Analyzer: Add an analyzer to find out scheduling misses in 1:1 edges (rbaalmohan)
TEZ-3794. tez-tools: swimlane does not recognize HistoryEventHandler.criticalEvents based logs (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3784. Submitting very large DAG throws com.google.protobuf.CodedInputStream exception (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3769. Unordered: Fix wrong stats being sent out in the last event, when final merge is disabled (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3777. Avoid buffer copies by passing RLE flag to TezMerger from PipelinedSorter (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3767. Shuffle should not report error to AM during inputContext.killSelf(). (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3698: UnorderedKV writer should be able to honor tez.runtime.enable.final-merge.in.output without pipelinedshuffle (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3701. UnorderedPartitionedKVWriter - issues with parallel Deflater usage, synchronousqueue in threadpool (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3700. Consumer attempt should kill itself instead of failing during validation checks with final merge avoidance (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3699. For large dataset, pipelined shuffle throws exceptions in consumer side for UnorderedPartitioned edge (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3680. Optimizations to UnorderedPartitionedKVWriter (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3649. AsyncHttpConnection should add StopWatch start (Fei Hui via rbalamohan)
TEZ-3582. Exception swallowed in PipelinedSorter causing incorrect results (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3551: FrameworkClient created twice causing minor delay (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3565: amConfig should check queuename isEmpty (Fei Hui via rbalamohan)
TEZ-3558. CartesianProduct is missing from the ExampleDriver class (Sushmitha Sreenivasan via rbalamohan)
Updating CHANGES.txt (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3547. Add TaskAssignment Analyzer (Dharmesh Kakadia via rbalamohan)
updating CHANGES.txt
TEZ-3533. ShuffleScheduler should shutdown threadpool on exit (rbalamohan)
TEZ-3868. Update website to factor in the TEZ trademark registration.
TEZ-3816. Add ability to automatically speculate single-task vertices. Contributed by Muhammad Samir Khan.
TEZ-3797. Add tez debug tool for comparing counters of 2 DAGs. Contributed by Prasanth Jayachandran.
TEZ-3736. SubmittedDAGs is always 0 in Resource Manager UI. Contributed by Artem Velykorodnyi.
TEZ-3730. Lower logging level in UnorderedPartitionedKVWriter.  Contributed by Prasanth Jayachandran.

TEZ-3700 addendum. Consumer attempt should kill itself instead of
failing during validation checks with final merge avoidance (rbalamohan)

TEZ-3696. Jobs can hang when both concurrency and speculation are
enabled. Contributed by Eric Badger.

TEZ-3703. Use a sha comparison to compare vertex and dag resources, if
there is a mismatch. (sseth)
TEZ-3689. Change minimum hadoop version to 2.7.0. (sseth)
TEZ-3660. Remove CHANGES.txt. (sseth)
TEZ-3651 part2. Update website, documentation etc for Tez 0.8.5 release.
TEZ-3651. Add section for 0.8.6
TEZ-3253. Remove special handling for last app attempt. Contributed by Akira Ajisaka.

TEZ-3647. Add a setting which lets Tez determine Xmx. Contributed by
Zhiyuan Yang.
TEZ-3644. Cleanup container list stored in AMNode. (sseth)

TEZ-3643. Long running AMs can go out of memory due to retained
AMContainer instances. (sseth)
TEZ-3637. TezMerger logs too much at INFO level. (sseth)

Revert "TEZ-3625. Dag.getVertex should obtain a readlock. (sseth)"

This reverts commit dcae5e42e961a6b2fd0e82a2392d601ca935d0f1.

TEZ-3634. reduce the default buffer sizes in PipelinedSorter by a small
amount. (sseth)

TEZ-3627. Use queue name available in RegisterApplicationMasterResponse
for publishing to ATS. Contributed by Harish Jaiprakash.
TEZ-3625. Dag.getVertex should obtain a readlock. (sseth)

TEZ-3624. Split multiple calls on the same line in
TaskCommunicatorContextImpl. (sseth)
TEZ-3550. Provide access to sessionId/dagId via DagClient. (sseth)
TEZ-3267. Publish queue name to ATS as part of dag summary. Contributed by Harish Jaiprakash.

TEZ-3609. Improve ATSv15 performance for DAG entities read calls.
Contributed by Harish Jaiprakash.

TEZ-3581. Add different logger to enable suppressing logs for specific
lines. Contributed by Harish Jaiprakash.

TEZ-3601. Add another HistoryLogLevel to suppress TaskAttempts at
specific levels. Contributed by Harish Jaiprakash.
TEZ-3600. Fix flaky test: TestTokenCache. Contributed by Harish Jaiprakash

TEZ-3589. add a unit test for amKeepAlive not being shutdown if an app
takes a long time to launch. (sseth)

TEZ-3458 addendum. Disable auto-grouping by default. Contributed by
Zhiyuan Yang.

TEZ-3584. amKeepAliveService in TezClient should shutdown in case of AM
failure. Contributed by Zhiyuan Yang.

TEZ-3579. Wrong configuration key for max slow start fraction in
CartesianProductVertexManager. Contributed by Zhiyuan Yang.

TEZ-3574. Container reuse won't pickup extra dag level local resource.
Contributed by Zhiyuan Yang.
TEZ-3443. Remove a repeated/unused method from MRTask. Contributed by darion yaphet

TEZ-3566. Avoid caching fs isntances in TokenCache after a point.
Contributed by Harish Jaiprakash.
TEZ-3568. Update SecurityUtils configuration to pick user provided configuration. Contributed by Harish Jaiprakash.
TEZ-3561. Fix wrong tez tarball name in install.md. Contributed by Akira Ajisaka.

TEZ-3534. Differentiate thread names on Fetchers, minor changes to
shuffle shutdown code. (sseth)
Update CHANGES.txt to reflect the backport of TEZ-3317 and TEZ-3437 to branch-0.8 and branch-0.7.

TEZ-3580. Tez UI: Pagination broken on queries page (sree)

TEZ-2712. Tez UI: Display the vertex description in the tooltip of vertex in DAG view UI (sree)

TEZ-3803. Tasks can get killed due to insufficient progress while waiting for shuffle inputs to complete. Contributed by Kuhu Shukla
TEZ-3807. InMemoryWriter is not tested with RLE enabled. Contributed by Muhammad Samir Khan
TEZ-3693. ControlledClock is not used. Contributed by Muhammad Samir Khan
TEZ-3702. Tez shuffle jar includes service loader entry for ClientProtocolProvider but not the corresponding class (jlowe)
TEZ-3695. TestTezSharedExecutor fails sporadically. (jlowe)
TEZ-3679. Minor ASF header issues. Contributed by Saijin Huang

issue_comments.body: Closing this out and using std patch on apache jira instead.

Hi @ljl1988com the four commits you are trying to request a merge for should already be in both master and branch 0.6. They will have different commit-ids as they were cherry-picked into the 0.6 branch.

Thanks @dharmeshkakadia. Can you file an apache jira at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/tez and attach the patch to the jira too ( we currently do not have the pre-commit tests running against git pull requests )
@dharmeshkakadia  Mind closing this pull request given that this is merged? Thanks.

pull_requests.title: [TEZ-3497] Upgrade Jetty to 9.3.X
pull_requests.body:
[Upgrade Jetty to 9.3.X](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TEZ-3497)

Jetty 6.X have not keep in maintain and should upgrade to the current version.

pull_requests.title: TEZ-3475 Merge duplicated method into base class
pull_requests.body:
Merge duplicated method (handleEvents and close) into MRTask.class

[Merge duplicated method into base class](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TEZ-3475)

pull_requests.title: [TEZ-3369][WIP] Fixing Tez's DAGClients to work with Cascading
pull_requests.body:
Adding a few APIs to Tez to help Cascading break its dependency on an internal implementation and still get some of the data it needs. 
Added APIs:

```
DAGInformation getDAGInformation()
TaskInformation getTaskInformation(String vertexID, String taskID)
List<TaskInformation> getTaskInformation(String vertexID, @Nullable String startTaskID, int limit)
```

Putting this PR out as a WIP to get some feedback on the APIs and the data they return. 
I'm still working through cleaning up the code, fixing some todos and testing more.

pull_requests.title: [TEZ-3369][WIP] Fixing Tez's DAGClients to work with Cascading
pull_requests.body: Putting a proof of concept PR for one of the approaches listed in the jira: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TEZ-3369

issue_comments.body: Closings as this is now merged.

pull_requests.title: squid:S1213 - The members of an interface declaration or class should appear in a pre-defined order
pull_requests.body:
This pull request is focused on resolving occurrence of Sonar rule
squid:S1213 - The members of an interface declaration or class should appear in a pre-defined order.
This pull request removes 165 minutes of technical debt.
You can find more information about the issue here:
https://dev.eclipse.org/sonar/rules/show/squid:S1213
Please let me know if you have any questions.
George Kankava

issue_comments.body: This is merged as part of Tez-3453.

commit_comments.body:
Hi @sidseth 
We are a team of researchers from Iowa State, The University of Texs at Dallas and Oregon State University, USA. We are investigating common/repeated code changes.
We have four short questions regarding the change in the image below which is part of this commit.
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2257582/23105972/689c3ca6-f6ac-11e6-9fbc-25a99afa493d.png)

Questions:

Q1- Is the change at these lines similar to any other changes (from other locations of the same commit or from other commits)? (yes, no, not sure)

Q2- Can you briefly describe the change and why you made it? (for example, checking parameter before calling the method to avoid a Null Pointer Exception)

Q3- Can you give it a name? (for example, Null Check)

Q4- Would you like to have this change automated by a tool? (Yes, No, Already automated)

The data collected from the answers will never be associated with you or your project. Our questions are about recurring code changes from the developer community, not about personal information. All the data is merged across recurring changes from GitHub repositories. We will publish aggregated data from the trends of the whole community. 
We have a long tradition of developing refactoring tools and contributing them freely to the Eclipse, Netbeans, Android Studio under their respective FLOSS licenses. For example, look at some of our recently released refactoring tools: http://refactoring.info/tools/ 

Thank you,
Hoan Nguyen https://sites.google.com/site/nguyenanhhoan/
Michael Hilton http://web.engr.oregonstate.edu/~hiltonm/
Tien Nguyen http://www.utdallas.edu/~tien.n.nguyen/
Danny Dig http://eecs.oregonstate.edu/people/dig-danny
